name: TranslateThis
0:
”Alexa open Translate This”
”Please translate How Are You”
”I want to use Spanish”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: translate this
des: Translate This is an application that anyone can use to translate some of the most basic words in the most common and important languages. By going through the prompts, you can quickly and easily get approximate translations that can be used immediately. Support for more languages, more phrases, and native pronunciation will shortly be implemented.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
